src_text: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him.
ref_text: NgeMsombuluko, Sara Danius, mabhalane wasikhatsi sonkhe weliKomidi iNobel leteKubhala kuleSwedish Academy, wamemetela kuwowonkhe nakuchubeka luhlelo lwerediyo kusiteshi iSveriges Radio eSweden lekomidi, ingakhoni kuchumana na-Bob Dylan ngalokucondzile mayelana nekuwina leNobel Prize yetekubhala ya-2016, yayekela imetamo yekuchumana naye.
hyp_text: Lesa, Sara Danius, setswaneng ya Nobel Komiti ya Liturasi ka le Academy ya Swedini, fa ke ka tlhapi le tona ya radio ya Sveriges Radio ka Sweden, ke a tlhapi kwa tlhapi ya komiti, ke a lebita ka Bob Dylan ka tlhapi ya 2016 ya Nobel ya Liturasi, ke a tlhapi ka tona ya tlhapi ya a lebita ka a le.

src_text: The great pyramid was created to honor the Pharaoh Khufu, and many of the smaller pyramids, tombs, and temples were built to honor Khufu's wives and family members.
ref_text: I-pyramid lenkhulu yakhiwelwa kuhlonipha Faro Khufu, futsi lamanyenti alama-pyramid, emathuna, nemathempeli akhiwelwa kuhlonipha bafati baKhufu nemalungu emndeni.
hyp_text: Ngwane lohla wamahle wamakhaya wabulala uKhufu, ngesikhathi sikhetho siboni kakhulu le-nyongo, inkhulu, nezinkhulumela zikhethekile kwiwabo kwaKhufu kanye nezinhlelo zabo.

src_text: The age where the events took place is commonly referred as the High Middle Ages the period of European history in the 11th, 12th, and 13th centuries (AD 1000–1300).
ref_text: Leminyaka lapho tehlakalo tenteka khona ngalokuvamile ibitwa ngekutsi i-High Middle Age sikhatsi semlandvo weYurophu ngemakhulu esi-11, 12, na-13 eminyaka (AD 1000–1300).

src_text: One of the most common methods used to illustrate the importance of socialization is to draw upon the few unfortunate cases of children who were, through neglect, misfortune, or wilful abuse, not socialized by adults while they were growing up.
ref_text: Lenye yetindlela letivame kakhulu letisetjentiswa kubekisa bumcoka kwekuhlangana kwemmango kutfola letindzaba tebantfwana lokwatsi ngalokungakafanele, noma banganakwanga, kuba nenhlanhla lembi, noma kuhlukubetwa mabomu, labadzala bangabavumeli kuhlangana nalabanye bantfu nabasakhulu.
